page.title: 14THREE GENERATIONS II
page.content: Mr. Strong's daughter, Margaret now Mrs.Foster, was born at the Royal United Hospital in l943, she is an only child. She also went to Swain _swick School. She walked to School where there was still only one class _room. There were 20 pupils in her class and two women teachers.When she failed her ll+ exam. she moved to Walcot Secondary School, Bath.At l5 she left and became a kennel maid part time and also worked on her father's farm and helped her mother in the home. The only entertainment in the village was family made. When nearly 23 she married Ray Foster, farm worker, and they have two children, a son Timothy and a daugher Alison. Mrs. Foster now works at Swainswick School as a dinner lady.
